thread.title: The Uber Forum reaches 500 member milestone today
thread.title_full: The Uber Forum reaches 500 member milestone today

author: Sally Jones
title: The Uber Forum reaches 500 member milestone today
text:
The Uber Forum is pleased to announce reaching 500 members. The Uber Forum was launched in 2015 to help drivers and riders learn about their ride-share options including with Uber, Lyft and more. The Uber Forum is a transportation network company ("TNC") community and resource. The Uber Forum was created by riders and drivers in 2015 in order to be a resource and share insights about TNC companies such as Uber, Lyft and more. The Uber Forum is an independent and unbiased resource not affiliated with any TNC.
I am pleased to announce the successful launch of the Uber Forum. The Uber Forum launched in 2015 to be a leading resource for Uber, Lyft and other TNC drivers and riders. The site has grown over 30% month over month since launch and has helped thousands of people including TNC drivers and riders with companies such as Uber and Lyft.
Today marks a significant milestone of reaching 500 members. The month of September was a record month in terms of unique visitors which tallied nearly 20k for the month. October is on pace to significantly exceed September's traffic.
Thanks to all of our members and visitors for making the Uber Forum a leading TNC community and resource on Uber, Lyft and more.
The Uber Forum has hundreds of individual city forums as well as: Uber Drivers Forum, Uber Riders Forum, Lyft Drivers Forum, Lyft Riders Forum, Rideshare Forum, TNC News Forum, and a For Sale / Wanted / Trades / Promotions / Deals Forum.
It is free to become a member and enjoy the full benefits of the Uber Forum. It only takes a minute to register. Please follow the registration link to become a member today: http://www.uberforum.com/register/
